text: spravedlyvyy retribution dlya tsykh khto boryutʹsya BOH ta Yoho kur'yer, ta zdiysnyuyutʹ horrendous zlochyny, musytʹ buty ubytyy, abo crucified, abo shchob maty yikhni ruky ta nohy vidrizani na zminnykh storonakh, abo shchob buty zaslani z zemli. Tse musytʹ prynyzyty yim u tse zhyttya, todi vony zaznayutʹ dalekoho hirshoho retribution u U maybutnʹomu
